title: Proper Watering
description: Water your plants only when the top 2 inches of soil are dry. Overwatering can cause root rot, so make sure your pot has good drainage.

title: Right Sunlight
description: Most indoor plants prefer bright, indirect sunlight. Avoid placing them in direct sun for long hours to prevent leaf burn.

title: Regular Fertilizing
description: Feed your plants with a balanced liquid fertilizer every 2â€“4 weeks during the growing season for healthy foliage.

title: Clean Leaves
description: Dust on leaves blocks sunlight. Wipe them gently with a damp cloth every few weeks to help your plants breathe.

title: Check Humidity
description: Many tropical plants love humidity. Use a humidifier or mist the leaves occasionally to keep them happy.
